channel.title: Steam Problems
channel.description: When I closed my steam to do something else and tried to reopen it it threw errors and would not let my steam open, I even rebooted and the same problem happened... Sooo I uninstalled steam and reinstalled it and it deleted all of my games as well, which took me A LONG TIME to download. WTF? I guess I'll start using the backup game option that I just now noticed. Anyways feel free to discuss any issues you've ever had with steam, this was just a rant topic lol.

item.title: Steam Problems
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

When I closed my steam to do something else and tried to reopen it it threw errors and would not let my steam open, I even rebooted and the same problem happened… Sooo I uninstalled steam and reinstalled it and it deleted all of my games as well, which took me A LONG TIME to download. WTF? I guess I’ll start using the backup game option that I just now noticed. Anyways feel free to discuss any issues you’ve ever had with steam, this was just a rant topic lol.
